title: U.R.F
body: when will u.r.f come back again next?

replies.body: I don't have any details on when U.R.F. will be back right now, but when it does come back it will most likely be a part of the Rotating Game Modes. Make sure to check those schedules and you'll be one of the first to know!

Why does it always take extremely long until the favorite game modes return?
We always get Ascension and Poro King. >:(

I do think you're already improving a lot by giving us Doom bots and Blood Moon, but I think it won't last long and we'll have Poroking again next month. :(

Love your username <3
Also waiting for URF
